alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Hanover and southeastern Pender Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1029 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rich Inlet, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Wrightsville Beach, Surf City, Rich Inlet, Figure Eight Island, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Mayfaire, Murrayville, Topsail, Windemere, Bayshore, Scotts Hill, Ogden, Porters Neck, Landfall, Kings Grant, Woodside and Edgecomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
